data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ghahari, Hassan, Moulet, Pierre (2013): An annotated catalog of the Iranian Pyrrhocoridae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomomorpha: Pyrrhocoroidea). Zootaxa 3609 (3): 335-342, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3609.3.8
